characters: Driver of a white sedan, driver of a green taxi, driver of a white van, motorcyclist
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving through an urban intersection. The white sedan ahead is maintaining a steady speed, while the green taxi and white van are moving in adjacent lanes. A motorcyclist appears on the right side of the road.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is gradually decelerating from 23 km/h to 0 km/h over the 10-second period, maintaining a safe distance from the white sedan ahead. The vehicle is preparing to stop due to the traffic conditions ahead.
key_objects: 1) Front: A white sedan, approximately 5 meters away, maintaining a steady speed. 2) Left: A green taxi, approximately 10 meters away, moving in the adjacent lane. 3) Right: A white van, approximately 8 meters away, moving in the adjacent lane. 4) Right: A motorcyclist, approximately 15 meters away, approaching the intersection.
